name: KS3Science
0:
”Alexa, open KS3 Science”
”Alexa, ask KS3 Science about chemistry”
”Alexa, tell KS3 Science to teach me biology”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: k. s. three science
des:
Learn key stage 3 science with over 100 fact-bites. Just ask KS3 science for biology, chemistry or physics and you'll be on top of your science in no time.

Key stage three is part of the UK National Curriculum, however this app is suitable for supplementing Junior High Science knowledge in the U.S.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
